controller

Class EarthQuakeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.EarthQuakeUtils

  • public class EarthQuakeUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    EarthQuakeUtils

    A utility class that can Filter Earthquake data based on

    • Magnitude
      • Earthquakes having a certain magnitude
      • Earthquakes having magnitude less than a given value
      • Earthquakes having magnitude more than a given value
      • Earthquakes whose magnitude fall in a range of magnitude values
    • Depth
      • Earthquakes having a certain magnitude
      • Earthquakes having magnitude less than a given value
      • Earthquakes having magnitude more than a given value
      • Earthquakes whose magnitude fall in a range of magnitude values

    Also can Convert Earthquake Data into PointFeatures to be used by UnfoldingMap API

    Since:
    21/7/2019
    See Also:
    EarthQuakeEntry, DataEntry

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public static java.lang.Iterable<EarthQuakeEntry> filter(java.lang.Iterable<EarthQuakeEntry> data,
                                                         EarthQuakeUtils.EarthQuakeFilter... filters)
        Filters EarthQuakes according to EarthQuakeFilters var args. General algorithm that is suitable for all filter usage and the filters used are static classes of the EarthQuakeUtils the method is static as it doesn't belong to an instance, it belongs to the class itself in concept
        Parameters:
        data - Iterable that holds the earthquake data in POJOs made by EarthQuakesParser
        filters - EarthQuakeFilter var arg that holds any number of filters and all of them will be applied
        Returns:
        Iterable containing EarthQuakeEntries that are applicable to given filters *

      • toPointFeatures

        public static java.util.List<de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.data.PointFeature> toPointFeatures(java.lang.Iterable<EarthQuakeEntry> data)
        Parses the Entries from the given RSS Feed file into Features for markers on map. making a List of PointFeatures and making a reference to each PointFeature made to put magnitude,depth,title,age properties in the HashMap of the pointFeature as its properties using the EarthQuake Pojo properties
        Parameters:
        data - Iterable made using the AbstractDataParser subclass EarthQuakesParser using .getParsedData()
        Returns:
        returns List corresponding to given EarthQuakeEntries to be used with UnfoldingMap API
